fn.p: Edited by: Andrei Mocan, Iuliu Hațieganu University of Medicine and Pharmacy, Romania
Reviewed by: Helen Skaltsa, National and Kapodistrian University of Athens, Greece; Antonios Chrysargyris, Cyprus University of Technology, Cyprus; Ligia Salgueiro, University of Coimbra, Portugal
This article was submitted to Ethnopharmacology, a section of the journal Frontiers in Pharmacology
†These authors have contributed equally to this work
